project_description: A simple Flutter application that shows a text with an icon. Initially, it displays a cat with a clock icon. When the text is clicked, it changes to a dog with a person icon.
architecture_overview: The project follows the Cubit pattern for state management. The main components include the UI layer with Flutter widgets, the state management layer with Cubits, and the data layer with models.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen: Clicks text
HomeScreen -> TextCubit: toggleText()
TextCubit -> TextModel: Update text and icon
TextModel -> HomeScreen: Notify state change
HomeScreen -> TextDisplay: Update UI
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using the Cubit pattern. The TextCubit is responsible for toggling the text and icon. When the user clicks on the text, the TextCubit updates the state, and the UI rebuilds to reflect the new state.
navigation_flow: The app consists of a single screen (HomeScreen). There is no navigation between multiple screens.
